::Cledar::

Cledar jumps to his feet and begins to walk backwards away from
Sinnertwin, jumping forward as the other pounces. He ends up behind
Sinnertwin, a blade emerging from his wrist and stabbing backwards at
the Decepticon.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Sinnertwin lands on the ground and advances uppon his prey, a long
> metalic tongue slithering out of each mouth, dancing upon the dager
like > teeth it posseses. He moves forward, and pounces, bitting with
each > mouth, and slashing with his fron paws.
